item.title: League of Legends - About the bad culture
item.description: I have been playing League of Legends (aka LoL) for such a long time. And I play it a lot. It puzzles me whether I am losing or earning time with this. For those who don’t know the game I am talking about, it is (usually) a 5 x 5 game where you need to destroy the enemy base to win. In this post I will mostly talk about the toxic culture around the League of Legends community from my perspective.
